name: Flow Of Pretentiousness
description:
A game about Choosing your own personal adventure.

12 possible endings, about 10-20 minutes of game time.

This is a class project due the date of this posting.  

My first attempt at game making in Renpy.

Music was made with beepbox.co,   Animations were made Krita. and edited together with Sony Vegas 14.

Things that I wanted to add that aren't in this version:

Customized fonts, more akin to the main menu style

Customized placement of singular objects of text i.e (Endings)

More animations for each route.
